did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Journal from trip to Boston as delegate from the Western Education Society; a diary; an academic notebook called an "index rerun"; his 1851 New Year's sermon; his 1855 Thanksgiving sermon; an historical sketch of the First Congregational Church of East Bloomfield, New York.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Henry Kendall was a minister and attended the Auburn Theological Seminary.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Journal from trip to Boston as delegate from the Western Education Society (May 23-June 14, 1854); a diary (April 9, 1855-September 19, 1881); an academic notebook called an "index rerun"; his 1851 New Year's sermon; his 1855 Thanksgiving sermon; an historical sketch of the First Congregational Church of East Bloomfield, New York.
